title: "BOLD Taxonomy DNA Data"

date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---
 - access BOLD insect taxonomy data:
```{r bold_barcode_data}
library(bold)
dfa <- bold_seq(taxon='Coelioxys')[[1]]
dfb <- bold_seq(taxon='Coelioxys')[[2]]
dfc <- bold_seq(taxon='Coelioxys')[[3]]
data.frame(dfa)
data.frame(dfb)
data.frame(dfc)
```
